pull.title: Add SegWit v0 (P2WPKH+P2WSH) filter type
pull.body:
- Add `0x01` to the `Basic` filter type to reflect Bitcoin Core's codebase.
- Add `0xFF`, `Invalid` filter filter type to reflect Bitcoin Core's codebase.
- Add new `0x02`, `V0` filter type, which incorporates `P2WPKH`+`P2WSH` scripts to map to PR https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18223. Thus this PR cannot be merged until https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18223 PR is merged.

events.body: For the record there is a discussion about that probably it should combine both P2WPKH and P2WSH scripts: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/18222#issuecomment-592631517

Update new filter proposal to V0 and add Invalid to reflect the code

events.message: Update new filter proposal to V0 and add Invalid to reflect the code

events.body: There seems to be a consensus that `P2WPKH+P2SH` is better than `P2WPKH` alone, so I updated this PR with that. There is still no consensus if new type should be added or not.
This has been rejected, so closing.
